description:
Rewrote the drums based on the following video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jQ_Sgk9-FzU

Also rewrote the vocals. It's not they were completely bad, but the writing was... Weird. I also separated the vocals in Eddie's main vocals and the band' harmonies.
title: Even Flow
